PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old married white man living in a non-metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. he has some college education but no degree. born and raised in the united states, james is a protestant and considers himself a born-again or evangelical christian, attending religious services once or twice a month.

politically, james identifies as a conservative republican and is registered to vote at his current address. he comes from a middle-income family, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually. while not actively involved in volunteering, james is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day.

james values his traditional beliefs and way of life. he is proud of his southern roots and cherishes the close-knit community in his small town. despite his age, he remains intellectually curious and keeps up with current events and technological advancements. however, he is also deeply grounded in his religious and political convictions, which shape his worldview.

in his free time, james enjoys outdoor activities like fishing and gardening. he is a devoted husband and takes great pride in his family. while he may hold some conservative views, he is generally open-minded and respectful of differing perspectives, as long as they align with his core values.
